rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-001Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won When an opportunity is closed, this rule sends an e-mail to the relevant audience.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, IsWon, ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Training"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Acquired Contract"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Intapp Prime") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-002Exxx ICR Opportunity Closed Won Sends an email notification whenever an opportunity closes as won for an internal change request.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity")) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-003xFxx Set In Manager Forecast Number
rules.formula: OR( ISCHANGED(In_Manager_Forecast__c), ISNEW() )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-007Exxx Alert when Time OSA is being drafted without Configurator Sends an email notification whenever a Time OSA is being drafted without Configurator
Rule Code: OPP-008Exxx Alert when Risk OSA is being drafted without Configurator Sends an email alert when an OSA is being drafted without Configurator in the Risk Practice practice group.
Rule Code: OPP-009Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won - Revenue When a revenue opportunity is closed, this rule sends an e-mail to the relevant audience.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Acquired")), ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Revenue Practice"), IsWon, ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-010Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won - Wall Builder When a Wall Builder opportunity is closed, this rule sends an e-mail to the relevant audience.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Acquired")), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Product_Line__c),"Open")), ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Risk Practice"), IsWon, ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-011Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won - Integration When an integration opportunity is closed, this rule sends an e-mail to the relevant audience.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Acquired")), ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Integration Practice"), IsWon, ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-012xFxx Check in Manager forecast if a deal is in best case or higher, it should be "in manager forecast"
Rule Code: OPP-013xFxx Un Check in Manager forecast if a deal moves from best case or higher to a pipeline or omitted, it should be removed from "in manager forecast"
Rule Code: OPP-014Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won - Intapp Open When an Intapp Open opportunity is closed, this rule sends an e-mail to the relevant audience.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Acquired")), CONTAINS(TEXT(Product_Line__c),"Open"), ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Risk Practice"), IsWon, ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-015xFxx Set Pre-Shopping & Shopping Dates when created This rule only evaluates when the opportunity is first created. It is a rule to handle the edge cases of when an opportunity is created in a far enough advanced stage.

Rule Code: OPP-016Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won - NA Large Law This opportunity sends an email notification to the regional head of sales and the owner of the opportunity that the opportunity has closed.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Acquired")), Sales_Territory__c="NA Large Law", IsWon, NOT(Maintenance_Amount__c > 20000), ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Intapp Prime") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-018Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won - NA Mid-size Law This opportunity sends an email notification to the regional head of sales and the owner of the opportunity that the opportunity has closed.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Acquired")), IsWon, Sales_Territory__c="NA Mid-size Law", NOT(Maintenance_Amount__c > 20000), ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Paused - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Paused - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Restarted - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Restarted - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Paused"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Restarted"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Intapp Prime") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-019Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won - Accounting/Consulting This opportunity sends an email notification to the regional head of sales and the owner of the opportunity that the opportunity has closed.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Acquired")), Sales_Territory__c="Accounting/Consulting", IsWon, NOT(Maintenance_Amount__c > 20000), ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Paused - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Paused - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Restarted - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Restarted - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Paused"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Restarted"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Intapp Prime") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-020Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won - APAC/EMEA This opportunity sends an email notification to the regional head of sales and the owner of the opportunity that the opportunity has closed.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Acquired")), OR( Sales_Territory__c="APAC", Sales_Territory__c="EMEA" ), IsWon, NOT(Maintenance_Amount__c > 20000), ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Paused - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Paused - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Restarted - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Restarted - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Paused"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Billing Restarted"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Intapp Prime") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-022xFxx Update_Date_Partner_Assigned Update Services Partner Assigned Date field when Services Partner field is changed.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Services_Partner__c)), ISCHANGED(Services_Partner__c) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-023xFxx Update Next Step Updated On and By Updates the Next Step Updated On and Next Step Updated By fields when Next Step field is changed
rules.formula: OR( ISCHANGED(NextStep), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK(NextStep)) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-024Exxx Notification: Opportunity Closed Won - Over 20K Recurring This opportunity sends an email notification to the regional head of sales and the owner of the opportunity that the opportunity has closed.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Acquired")), IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c > 20000, ISCHANGED(IsWon), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Accounting"), CONTAINS(Simple_Type__c,"Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Intapp Prime") ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-025xFxx Update Primary Competitor Last Modified Updates the Primary Competitor - Last Modified Date field when Primary Competitor field is changed
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Primary_Competitor__c)

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-026xFxx Update Primary Business Problem Last Modified Updates the Primary Business Problem - Last Modified field when Primary Business Problem is changed
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Identified_Pain__c)

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-027Exxx Opportunity with Services Closed Won Sends email notification whenever a opportunity with services is closed won.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, IsWon, Services_Opportunity_Product_Count__c > 0 )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-028Exxx Process Cancellation - Past Close Date Sends an email alert to sales ops whenever there is a past due process cancellation.
rules.formula: AND( Process_Cancellation__c, CloseDate <= TODAY(), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"License Conversion - Recurring Decrease")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - User Count Decrease")), NOT(IsClosed) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-029Exxx Process Cancellation - Future Close Date Sends email notification to Finance whenever a Process Cancellation has a future close date.
rules.formula: AND( Process_Cancellation__c, NOT(CloseDate <= TODAY()), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"License Conversion - Recurring Decrease")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - User Count Decrease")), NOT(IsClosed) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-030Exxx Process Cancellation - Past Close Date - EUL / Conversions Sends an email alert to Diane whenever a process cancellation has a past close date (with EUL/Conversions)
rules.formula: AND( Process_Cancellation__c, CloseDate <= TODAY(), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type,"License Conversion - Recurring Decrease"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - User Count Decrease") ), NOT(IsClosed) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-031Exxx Process Cancellation - Future Close Date - EUL / Conversions Sends an email alert to finance whenever there is a process cancellation with a future date (with EUL/Conversions)
rules.formula: AND( Process_Cancellation__c, NOT(CloseDate <= TODAY()), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type,"License Conversion - Recurring Decrease"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - User Count Decrease") ), NOT(IsClosed) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-032xFxx Populate Is in Obtain Contract Checks ''In Obtain Contract'' field when Stage equals to "Obtain Contract"
Rule Code: OPP-033Exxx Notify PjM Opp Close Sends an email alert to the Project Manager when an opportunity is won.
Rule Code: OPP-034xxOx UpdateOpportunityInDTE Sends out an Outbound message whenever AccountId or Name or Sale Category or StageName values changed or a new opportunity is created
rules.formula: ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(AccountId) || ISCHANGED(Name) || ISCHANGED(Sale_Category__c) || ISCHANGED(StageName)

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-035EFxx Email Cancellation - Cloud Sends an email notification whenever there is a cancellation on an opportunity for Cloud.
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS(TEXT(Product_Line__c),"Cloud"), Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-036xFxx Services Project Type - Consulting Updates the Services Project Type to Consulting
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Consulting Services")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-037xFxx Services Project Type - Implemetations Updates the Services Project Type to Implementations for Legal customer types.
rules.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Product") )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-038xFxx Services Project Type - Change Request
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Services Change Request")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-039xFxx Services Project Type - Other Updates the Services Project Type to None when Type is set to certain values
rules.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Module"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Recurring Adjustment"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Direct - Other"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Downgrade - CPI"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Downgrade - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Paused - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Paused - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Restarted - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Restarted - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Price Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Thompon Elite"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - User Count Decrease"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - User Count Uplift"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Version License"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "OEM - Other"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Practice Credit Adjustment"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Quota Credit Adjustment"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Reseller - Other"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Unsuccessful Sales Conversion - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Unsuccessful Sales Conversion - Module"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Unsuccessful Sales Conversion - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Unsuccessful Trial - Product Downgrade"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Paused"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Restarted"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "License Conversion - Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Entitlement Cleanup"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Recovery"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Services Change Request - Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Paused/Restarted"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recurring Adjustment"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Acquired Add-on Module"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Acquired New Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Acquired New Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Assessment/POC"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - License Band Uplift") )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-040xFxx Services Project Type - Upgrade
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Type, "Upgrade")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-041xFxx Services Project Type - Services Only
rules.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Additional Services"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Services - Partner") )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-042xFxx Populate Date Opportunity Closed Populates date closed when Opportunity is closed

criteriaItems.value: Intapp Open - Terms of Business - Cloud

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-043Exxx Cloud Opportunity Created Sends an email notification whenever a cloud opportunity has been created.
Rule Code: OPP-044xFxx Closed Lost stage sets CloseDate Updates the 'Close Date' to TODAY() when Stage = 'Closed Lost'
Rule Code: OPP-045xFxx Update Owner Manager email Sets the Opportunity Owner's Manager's email when Opportunity owner is changed
rules.formula: OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(OwnerId) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-046xFxx Clear Review Status SC-000052 Set Review status to blank when Opportunity stage is changed
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(StageName) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-047xFxx In Manager Forecast for Closed Won Updates the IMF/Upside and In Manager Forecast fields whenever an opportunity is closed won.
Rule Code: OPP-048xFxx Services Project Type - Training Updates the Services Project Type to Training when Type is "Training"
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Type, "Training")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-049xFxx Set Review Status for New Opportunities SC-000003 Populate review status on certain conditions
rules.formula: AND( Probability >=0.4, OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Recovered Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Recovered Product"), ISPICKVAL(Package__c, "Upsell to Intapp Time: Total Time Management"), ISPICKVAL(Package__c, "Upsell to Total Time"), ISPICKVAL(Package__c, "Upsell to Total Time Cloud"), AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Add-on Module"), Maintenance_Amount__c > 20000 ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-050xFxx Track Regional VP Note Updates Tracks when and by who the Regional VP Notes were updated
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Regional_VP_Notes__c)

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-051xFxx Update Services Project Type - Intapp Prime SC-000054 Populates Services Project Type when Type is set to "Intapp Prime"
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Type, "Intapp Prime")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-052xFxx Update Stage Approval Required Field SC-000059 Checks ''Stage Approval Required'' on certain conditions on Opportunity Stage, Type, Package and Maintenance Amount
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Target Account")), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - New Converted Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - New Converted Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - New Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - New Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - New Recovered Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - New Recovered Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Early Adopter Program"), ISPICKVAL(Package__c,"Upsell to Intapp Time: Total Time Management"), ISPICKVAL(Package__c,"Upsell to Total Time"), ISPICKVAL(Package__c,"Upsell to Total Time Cloud"), AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Add-on module"), Maintenance_Amount__c > 20000 ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-053xFxx Update Stage Notes Updated On and By
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Current_Stage_Notes__c)

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-054xFxx Update Close Date to Previous Value
Rule Code: OPP-055xxxx Update CSM Account Mgr Field on Opportunity
rules.formula: TRUE

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-056xFxx At-Risk Remove Add a task to the opportunity when the At Risk chances from True to False.
rules.formula: At_Risk__c = False && NOT(ISNEW()) && PRIORVALUE(At_Risk__c) = True && Don_t_send_At_Risk_Notification__c <> True

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-057xFxx At-Risk Add Add a task to the opportunity when the At Risk changes from False to True.
rules.formula: At_Risk__c = True && NOT(ISNEW()) && PRIORVALUE(At_Risk__c) = False && Don_t_send_At_Risk_Notification__c <> True

criteriaItems.value: New Software Product,Add-on Software,License Count Uplift

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-058Exxx Alert when open Opportunity is past its Close Date Alert the opportunity owner if an opportunity is still open after the close date has past.
Rule Code: OPP-059xFxx Edit Rule Stage Approval Previously Unchecked WF Rule Edit Rule Stage Approval Previously Unchecked WF Rule
rules.formula: Stage_Approval_Required__c = FALSE

criteriaItems.value: New Software Product,Add-on Software,License Count Uplift,Additional Services

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-060EFxx CRD Notification on Opportunity Won Notify the CRDs on Opportunity - Won (excluding CPI & unrelated types)
Rule Code: OPP-061EFxx Email Cancellation Sends an email notification whenever there is a cancellation on an opportunity.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-062EFxx Email Cancellation: APAC Integration Sends an email alert if an opportunity meeting certain criteria is cancelled in the APAC territory and sets the Internal Notification Sent checkbox to true.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, Account.Simple_Territory__c = "APAC" , ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Integration Practice"), Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-063EFxx Email Cancellation: APAC Revenue Sends an email alert if an opportunity meeting certain criteria is cancelled in the APAC territory. Also sets the Internal Notification Sent checkbox to true.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, Account.Simple_Territory__c = "APAC" , ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Revenue Practice"), Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-064EFxx Email Cancellation: APAC Risk Sends an email alert if an opportunity meeting certain criteria is cancelled in the APAC territory. Also sets the Internal Notification Sent checkbox to true.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, Account.Simple_Territory__c = "APAC" , ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Risk Practice"), Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-065EFxx Email Cancellation: EMEA Integration Sends an email alert if an opportunity meeting certain criteria is cancelled in the EMEA territory. Also sets the Internal Notification Sent checkbox to true.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, Account.Simple_Territory__c = "EMEA", ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Integration Practice"), Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-066EFxx Email Cancellation: EMEA Revenue Sends an email alert if an opportunity meeting certain criteria is cancelled in the EMEA territory. Also sets the Internal Notification Sent checkbox to true.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, Account.Simple_Territory__c = "EMEA", ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Revenue Practice"), Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-067EFxx Email Cancellation: EMEA Risk Sends an email alert if an opportunity meeting certain criteria is cancelled in the EMEA territory. Also sets the Internal Notification Sent checkbox to true.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, Account.Simple_Territory__c = "EMEA", ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Risk Practice"), Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-068EFxx Email Cancellation: North America Integration Sends an email alert if an opportunity meeting certain criteria is cancelled in the North America territory. Also sets the Internal Notification Sent checkbox to true.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, OR( Account.Simple_Territory__c = "Eastern US", Account.Simple_Territory__c = "Western US/Canada" ), ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Integration Practice"), Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-069EFxx Email Cancellation: North America Revenue Sends an email alert if an opportunity meeting certain criteria is cancelled in the North America territory. Also sets the Internal Notification Sent checkbox to true.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, OR( Account.Simple_Territory__c = "Eastern US", Account.Simple_Territory__c = "Western US/Canada" ), ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Revenue Practice"), Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-070EFxx Email Cancellation: North America Risk Sends an email alert if an opportunity meeting certain criteria is cancelled in the North America territory. Also sets the Internal Notification Sent checkbox to true.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Practice Credit Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Quota Credit Adjustment")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - CPI"), Maintenance_Amount__c>-5000 ) ), IsClosed, IsWon, Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, OR( Account.Simple_Territory__c = "Eastern US", Account.Simple_Territory__c = "Western US/Canada" ), ISPICKVAL(Practice_Group__c,"Risk Practice"), Internal_Notification_Sent__c=FALSE )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-071Exxx Opportunity Advancement Notification - Business Case Development Sends an email notification to Matt DeVoll whenever an opportunity moves from Business Case Development to Evaluation of Options
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Business Case Development"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Evaluation of Options"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Add-on module"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Product") ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-072Exxx Opportunity Advancement Notification - Investigation Sends an email notification to Matt DeVoll whenever an opportunity moves from Investigation to Business Case Development
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Investigation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Business Case Development"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Add-on module"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Product") ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-073EFxx Opportunity Advancement Notification - Expression of Interest Sends an email notification to Matt DeVoll whenever an opportunity moves stages.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Expression of Interest"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Investigation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Business Case Development"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Evaluation of Options"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Resolution of Concerns"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Get Management Approval") ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Product"), ISPICKVAL(Package__c, "Upsell to Intapp Time: Total Management"), ISPICKVAL(Package__c, "Upsell to Total Time"), ISPICKVAL(Package__c, "Upsell to Total Time Cloud") ), PRIORVALUE(Probability)<Probability )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-074Exxx Proposed Stage Updated Sends an email notification whenever the proposed stage is changed on any opportunity.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Proposed_Stage__c)

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-075EFxx Opportunity Stage Approval Request Sends an email whenever an opportunity Proposed Stage is set to "Request Approval"
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Proposed_Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(Proposed_Stage__c, "Request Approval") )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-076Exxx POC/ROR Trigger This is triggered when the POC/ROR checkbox is checked. To notify the implementation director.

Rule Code: OPP-077xFxx Updates CSD/M email on Opportunities Updates CSD/M email on the Opportunities from CSM Account Mgr; works in conjunction with Process Builder rule: 'Update CSM Account Manager email address on Contacts & Opportunities v2"
rules.formula: TRUE

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-078Exxx Notification: Training Opportunity Closed Won When a training opportunity is closed, this rule sends an e-mail to the relevant audience.
rules.formula: AND( Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, IsWon, ISCHANGED(IsWon), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Training") )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-079xFxx Populate Firm Maturity Status - Decentralized
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Account.Firm_Maturity_Status__c, "Decentralized")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-080xFxx Populate Firm Maturity Status - Emerging Populate Firm Maturity Status - Emerging when Account's Firm Maturity Status is "Emerging"
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Account.Firm_Maturity_Status__c, "Emerging")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-081xFxx Populate Firm Maturity Status - Transactional
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Account.Firm_Maturity_Status__c, "Transactional")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-082xFxx Populate Firm Maturity Status - Centralized
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Account.Firm_Maturity_Status__c, "Centralized")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-083Exxx Opportunity Stage Change Sends an email notification if the stage of the opportunity is changed.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), OwnerId="00550000001N5So" )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-084xFxx Update PGL Non-Compliance Date Populates PGL Non-Compliance Flag Date when PGL Non Compliance Flag is changed
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(PGL_Non_Compliance_Flag__c)

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-085Exxx Opportunity OSA Request Notification Sends email notification to to request contracts to be created.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type , "Training"), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(StageName) ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Selected") )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-086Exxx Sends an email alert whenever Create or merge with OA project field is set to ''create a new project'' or ''merge with existing project'' and project template has a value
Rule Code: OPP-087Exxx Sends an email alert whenever Opportunity Stage is Closed Won or Closed Lost and Project info. is populated.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Project__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Project_Template__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( Create_Merge_Project_in_OA__c))), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Lost') ) )

rules.description: email alert when Opportunity."Request OSA" changed to true and Account."Pre 9.4.1. Liability Annex Executed" is False
rules.formula: AND( Account.Pre_9_4_1_Liability_Annex_Executed__c=False, NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.Liability_Annex_Status__c,"Received"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Liability_Annex_Status__c,"Drafted"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Liability_Annex_Status__c,"Requested") )), Request_OSA__c=True, NOT(CONTAINS(Opp_Product_Lines__c, "Cloud")), OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.2"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.3"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.4")), Annex_email_sent__c =False )

rules.description:
Liability Annex
Send email to Contracts Operations ONLY (Rita Rodriguez, Vera Friss) to get new agreement. CC the Owner of the Account
rules.formula:
AND( Account.Pre_9_4_1_Liability_Annex_Executed__c=False, Annex_email_sent__c = FALSE, ISBLANK(Account.Liability_Annex_Contract_Number__c), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.Liability_Annex_Status__c,"Received"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Liability_Annex_Status__c,"Drafted"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Liability_Annex_Status__c,"N/A"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Liability_Annex_Status__c,"Requested") )), Request_OSA__c=True,
OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"8.5"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"8.8"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"8.9"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.0"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.1"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.2"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.3"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.4") ) )

rules.description:
Cloud Addendum
Master Terms: Term Version < 10.4 (needs to be determined) Master Terms: Cloud Addendum = NULL Request OSA ISCHANGED to TRUE Opportunity Product Lines (Text) CONTAINS "Cloud" Annex_email_sent__c = FALSE
rules.formula: AND( ISBLANK(Account.Cloud_Addendum__c), Annex_email_sent__c = FALSE, Request_OSA__c=True, CONTAINS(Opp_Product_Lines__c,"Cloud"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"8.5"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"8.8"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"8.9"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.0"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.1"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.2"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.3"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.4"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.4.1"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"9.4v3"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"10.1.1"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"10.2"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"10.2.1"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"10.2.2"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Contract_Term_Version__c,"10.3") ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-092Exxx Sends out an email alert to Ashish when OA Project fields on Opportunity are populated and Opportunity Stage is either 'Closed - Won' or 'Closed - Lost'.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Project__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Create_Merge_Project_in_OA__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Project_Template__c))), OR( ISPICKVAL (StageName,'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL (StageName,'Closed Lost')) )

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-093xFxx Services Project Type - Solution Extension/Module
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Add-on module")

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-094Exxx Generates billing pause document/email for contract opps based on information provided by CSM/Jennifer
Rule Code: OPP-094xFxx Services Project Type - Early Adopter
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Type, "Early Adopter Program")

rules.description: For future use (not active as of June 4):Rule Code: OPP-095Exxx Generates email when approval from finance is received
Rule Code: OPP-096xFxx Set Entered Investigation Date
rules.formula: AND( Probability > 0.09, ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Accepted__c, "Yes") )

rules.description: Clears the value of the Opportunity Accepted field when the Stage is changed.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), PRIORVALUE(Probability) > 0.09, ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Pre-Funnel') )

rules.description: When Stage is changed. Previous value is pushed to "Previous stage" field
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(StageName)

rules.description: Rule Code: OPP-099xFxx Set Last Entered Investigation Date
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Accepted__c ,'Yes'), Previous_stage__c ='Pre-Funnel', ISPICKVAL(StageName ,'Qualify') ), AND( ISCHANGED(Opportunity_Accepted__c ), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Accepted__c ,'Yes'), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName ,'Qualify'), ISPICKVAL(StageName ,'Verify'), ISPICKVAL(StageName ,'Select'), ISPICKVAL(StageName ,'Propose'), ISPICKVAL(StageName ,'Closed Won') ) ) )
(Probability>=0.7)
(Probability>=0.7)
(Probability>=0.7)
(Probability>=0.7)
